name: _DgRadioactiveIsotope
description: Details of the radioactive isotope contained in the product

columns.name: _contentOfDgProductRadioactive
columns.description: Reference to the DgProductRadioactive this Isotope is contained in

columns.name: _physicalChemicalForm
columns.description: A description of the physical and chemical form of the material.

columns.name: _checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: _activityLevelMeasure
columns.description: Numeric expression of the activity of a radioactive Item

columns.name: _criticalitySafetyIndexNumeric
columns.description: Applies to fissile material only; other than fissile excepted. A numeric value expressed to one decimal place preceded by the letters CSI.

columns.name: _isotopeId
columns.description: Id of each radionuclide or for mixtures of radionuclides.

columns.name: _isotopeName
columns.description: The name or symbol of each radionuclide or for mixtures of radionuclides; an appropriate general description; or a list of the most restrictive radionuclides.

columns.name: _lowDispersibleIndicator
columns.description: A notation that the material is low dispersible radioactive material.

columns.name: _specialFormIndicator
columns.description: A notation that the material is special form

columns.name: _skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
